Package gov.sandia.geotessbuilder

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylist.ArrayListIntrinsic
gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylist.ArrayListDouble
gov.sandia.geotessbuilder.Vertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Vertex extends gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylist.ArrayListDouble
Vertex represents a single point on the surface of a unit sphere, represented by a unit vector. Two nodes are .equal() if their dot product is very close to one. Vertex maintains a list of Triangles of which it is a member. This list is complicated by the fact that a Vertex can belong to triangles in many different tessellations and on different tessellation levels. It is the responsibility of the caller to populate the list of triangles with the appropriate set for the task at hand and them clear the set when the task is complete.
Author:
sballar
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vertex()
    Default constructor initializes position to north pole.
    Vertex(double[] unitVector)
    Parameterized constructor sets this Vertex's position to a copy of the supplied unit vector.
    Vertex(Vertex... v)
    Parameterized constructor sets this Vertex's position to the vector sum of the supplied vectors, normalized to unit length.
